thread.title: Pick Em: New Games are in
thread.title_full: Pick Em: New Games are in

title: Pick Em: New Games are in
text:
Then makes sure and play 2015 Beat EDGY Weekly 
So are you ready? It's EASY to play! Just click the link to Beat EDGYTIM Weekly and follow the simple rules and instructions and you too can TRY to match picks with EDGYTIM. 
Make sure to check out the EDGYTIM's weekly top picks later this week, or roll the dice and pick your winners NOW . 
Deadline for Week 9 selections is Friday, October 23rd at 2:00PM CST. NO ENTRIES WILL BE ACCEPTED AFTER 2PMM CST. 
Also, only ONE ENTRY PER EMAIL ADDRESS/POSTER will be allowed. Winners are announced the Wednesday after each week's games are played. 
Beat EDGY Weekly Week 8 results 
Congrats to Second1 for going a perfect 10-0 and is this week's winner. 
News and Notes from Week 8 action 
206 entries EDGY in Week 8? 8-2 (59-21 overall in 2015) Others of Note? 15 players went 9-1 Average record of Week 8? 8-2 Hardest games to Pick in Week 8? St Laurence over Bishop Mac (EDGY error everyone got a free win) 12 incomplete or invalid entries FEATURED PRODUCT
